name: Cookie Monster Munch
summary: Cookie Monster Munch is a video game developed by Atari and Children's Computer Workshop for the Atari 2600 and released in 1983.
info:
• 开发: Children's Computer Workshop, Inc.、Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1983年9月
  • 程序: Gary Stark
